sections.title: Structure

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The section on 'Structure' does not contain diagrams or images; hence, the requirement for using a standard format for diagrams is not applicable.
As there are no diagrams or images in this section, there is no need to suggest expansions to the standardized formatting.

sections.meta_notes: The section provides a detailed textual description of the AGK protein's structure without the use of diagrams or illustrations.
